com.futuresailors.battleships.controller

Class SinglePlayerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.futuresailors.battleships.controller.SinglePlayerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller, GameTypeController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReloadedModeController

    public class SinglePlayerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameTypeController
    Controller for the main game in single player mode. This creates the ships for the opponent creates the opponents grid and initialises the AI chosen by the player.
    Author:
    Michael Conroy, Joe Baldwin
